properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 7:52PM MST until January 13 at 10:00AM MST by NWS Salt Lake City UT
properties.description:
* WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 7 inches.

* WHERE...Wasatch Mountain Valleys.

* WHEN...From midnight tonight to 10 AM MST Monday.

* IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous
conditions could significantly impact the morning commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The heaviest snow will likely occur during
the Monday morning commute. Allow extra travel time.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling.

For graphical depictions of the snowfall forecast, including
Official NWS Forecast, High End Amount, and Low End Amount, visit
weather.gov/slc/winter.

For winter road conditions from the Utah Department of
Transportation, visit
http://www.udottraffic.utah.gov/roadweatherforecast.aspx or dial
511.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM MIDNIGHT TONIGHT TO 10 AM MST MONDAY
